name: Nothing Remains
description:
Get it here!! -> https://github.com/Zach-Kolman/RE-Clone/releases/tag/proto

This is a very short proof of concept for an old school Resident Evil style survival horror/survival horror. The fate of the project is currently unknown, so let me know what you think! Really want to know if this is even something people would be interesting in seeing more of. 

-NOTHING REMAINS-

Experience the story of an unknown soldier stuck  in a chaotic flux between the present and the distant past. Explore a foreboding high tech facility along with a dank and decrepit medieval dungeon as technology across eras begins to merge, as your very reality begins to fracture, forcing you to confront your impermanence in the universe. 

-CONTROLS-

W, S - Move Forward/Move Backwards

A, D - Turn Left/Turn Right

Mouse Left - Shoot (Must be aiming to shoot)

Mouse Right(Held) - Aim

F - Toggle Flashlight

R - Reload

E - Interact

Left Shift - Sprint
